oprlm.description: The OPRLM database includes all unique experimental structures of transmembrane (TM) proteins and a large number of peripheral proteins and membrane-active peptides oriented in lipid membranes by PPM 3.0.
oprlm.name: Orientations of Proteins in Realistic Lipid Membranes

publications.title: OPRLM: A Web Tool and a Database for Positioning and Simulations of Proteins in Realistic Lipid Membranes.
